text: We need to decide on the approach for the next phase of the project. I believe an Agile methodology is the way to go. I'm sorry, but I beg to differ. While Agile may allow us to adapt to changes more efficiently, I still think Waterfall would be a better option. It offers a more structured approach that will suit this project better. I see what you mean. I strongly feel that Agile aligns with our team's strengths, though. I think we'll have a greater chance of success with it. Well, I think everyone is more used to Agile, right? Okay, I give in. We can proceed with the Agile approach.
